explanation: [0-0] In front of a beige background, a blonde woman in a yellow top sits at a table filled with small clothes and shoes of various colors.

[0-7] First, the woman in yellow looks up, opens her mouth slightly, then takes a crown from under the table with both hands and puts it in her left hand. Her left hand holds the crown, her right hand rests on the table, facing forward with her mouth wide open and her eyes closed. The camera slowly zooms in as the woman closes her mouth and smiles, her face turned to the left. The shot zooms in on a close-up of the crown.
